channel.title: Lists
channel.description: ok i was learning about lists in java, my teacher doesnt really explain it very well, can someone give me a clear definition of lists in java and what they would be used for over arrays?

item.title: Lists
item.dc:creator: @abraham2119 abraham2119
item.description:
@abraham2119 wrote:

[quote=“la­wl, post:7, topic:369983”][quote author=abraham2119 link=topic=466098.msg3408846#msg3408846 date=1290528305]
both xaves and davidi2 are wrong

a list is simply a wrapper around a dynamically resizeable array
[/quote]
what if its a linkedlist?? infact list generally means linkedlist. arraylist is what wraps an array

the best definition of a list is an abstract data type that provides a method to add and remove and to iterate over all elements[/quote]that’s true, i thought he was referring strictly to an arraylist since he asked to compare ‘a list to an array’ and any other type of list isnt really equitable to an array…

Read full topic

item.title: Lists
item.dc:creator: @lawl lawl
item.description:
@lawl wrote:

[quote=“abraham2119, post:5, topic:369983”]both xaves and davidi2 are wrong

a list is simply a wrapper around a dynamically resizeable array[/quote]
what if its a linkedlist?? infact list generally means linkedlist. arraylist is what wraps an array

the best definition of a list is an abstract data type that provides a method to add and remove and to iterate over all elements

Read full topic

item.description:
@xryz wrote:

thanks for this question and answers. i learned something that solved a problem i was having with a thing i was trying to do with arrays. i should invest my free time on reading over things in the api, and trying to find new things out. well i do read and try to find out new things in my free time but i guess i havent been searching as hard/efficiently as i should.

item.title: Lists
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Lists are good when the order of the list doesn’t matter as much as what is in it. In arrays, you usually have pre-defined index’s that hold certain parts, but in a list you are usually using everything at once so it doesn’t matter (as much).

Because Abraham didn’t get what I meant:
array is gud wen it stays same size
list is gud wen it changes size

Read full topic

item.title: Lists
item.dc:creator: @xaves xaves
item.description:
@xaves wrote:

lists are better than arrays( in some cases) because it doesnt have a defined size.

Read full topic
